name: Full Contact Boggle
description:
Bored with shaking that loud little brown box of frustration? Tired of not being able to fricking bodyslam your opponents like they deserve? Enjoy roleplaying as the Game Grumps?

What's that? Your answer to all three was "yes"?

Well... Boy do I have the game for you ;) But don't lose your shorts just yet, download it and play for yourself!

SPELL words by clicking adjacent letters (it's boggle)

CHALLENGE your enemies, excessively!

TYPE insults at a lightning fast pace

and finally... SMACK DOWN!!!

BOGGLE RULES: Click letters that are next to each other in the boggle box to spell a word. Then, click the top bar where the word appears to submit it.
